title: Lifecycle Fields
description: A set of meta-data fields that describe lifecycle events related to AJO entities.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/life.title: Action
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/life.description: The type of process being executed (e.g., publishing, stopping, delivering).

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/life.title: Action Status
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/life.description: Status of the action (e.g., initiated, failed, completed).

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/life.title: Source ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/life.description: Identifier for the AJO entity (e.g., journey ID, campaign ID).

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/life.title: Source Type
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/life.description: Type of the AJO entity (e.g., campaign, journey).

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/life.title: Source Name
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/life.description: Human-readable name of the AJO entity.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/life.title: Source State
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/life.description: The lifecycle state of the AJO entity (e.g., draft, live, completed).

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/life.title: Is Recurrent
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/life.description: Indicates if this lifecycle event is part of a recurring AJO entity.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/life.title: Batch Instance ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/life.description: Unique identifier for the batch instance.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/life.title: Recurrence Index
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/life.description: Index value representing the recurrence index of a recurring AJO entity.
